info.name: FlavorDB API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete Postman collection for FlavorDB API with all 39 endpoints, authorization, and examples. Ready to import and use.

item.name: Property Controller

request.description: Finds molecules based on their taste detection threshold values. Use when researching how potent different flavor compounds are.
Searches for molecules by their synthesis or production method. Use when you need to know if a flavor is naturally derived or synthesized.
Finds molecules with specific trade association usage guidelines. Use when checking industry usage recommendations and restrictions.
Searches for molecules by where they naturally occur in nature. Use when researching natural sources of flavor compounds.
Retrieves properties for molecules within a NAS (National Academy of Sciences) number range. Use when working with batches of NAS classified compounds.
Retrieves properties for molecules within a JECFA (Joint FAO/WHO Expert Committee) number range. Use when analyzing groups of JECFA evaluated compounds.
Finds molecules by International Organization of the Flavor Industry (IOFI) categories. Use when working with global flavor industry classifications.
Retrieves properties for molecules within a Flavor (FL) number range. Use when working with batches of flavor number classifications.
Retrieves properties for molecules within a FEMA (Flavor and Extract Manufacturers Association) number range. Use when batch processing FEMA approved flavors.
Searches by European Inventory of Existing Commercial Substances number. Use when checking European chemical registration status.
Searches molecules by text descriptions of their properties or characteristics. Use when looking for molecules based on descriptive terms.
Retrieves properties for molecules within a Council of Europe (COE) number range. Use when batch processing COE registered compounds.
Searches molecules by their Council of Europe (COE) approval status. Use when checking which flavors are approved for use in Europe.
Finds molecules based on their aroma detection threshold. Use when studying how easily different aromas can be detected.

item.description: APIs for regulatory and industry classification data for flavor molecules

item.name: More Property Controller

request.description: Finds molecules within a specified surface area range. Use when filtering by molecular size window.
Finds molecules within a specified rotatable bond count range. Use when filtering by molecular flexibility range.
Finds molecules within a specified atom count range. Use when filtering by molecular size window.
Finds molecules within a specified total ring count range. Use when filtering by structural complexity range.
Finds molecules within a specified energy value range. Use when filtering by molecular stability window.
Finds molecules within a specified aromatic ring count range. Use when filtering by aromatic character range.
Finds molecules within a specified aromatic bond count range. Use when analyzing varying degrees of aromaticity.
Finds molecules within a specified ALogP (lipophilicity) range. Use when filtering by fat/water solubility properties.
Retrieves additional properties for molecules within a PubChem ID range. Use when batch retrieving extended properties for molecule sets.

item.description: APIs for detailed chemical and physical property data

item.name: Molecule Controller

request.description: Finds molecules with molecular weights within a specified range. Use when you need molecules within a particular size window.
Filters molecules by their chemical type or classification. Use when you need molecules of a specific chemical category.
Finds molecules with hydrogen bond donor counts within a range. Use when filtering molecules by their hydrogen bonding capacity.
Finds molecules with hydrogen bond acceptor counts within a range. Use when analyzing molecule interaction properties within specific limits.

item.name: Molecules By Topological Polar Surface Area Range

request.description: Finds molecules within a specified polar surface area range. Use when filtering molecules by their absorption or permeability characteristics.
Retrieves molecules within a range of PubChem IDs. Use when batch processing or analyzing molecules in a specific ID range.
Finds molecules within a specified mass range. Use when analyzing mass spectrometry results or filtering by mass window.

item.name: Molecules By Heavy Atom Count Range

request.description: Finds molecules with heavy atom counts within a specified range. Use when filtering by molecular complexity or size.
Finds molecules that contain specific chemical functional groups. Use when researching molecules with particular chemical structures or properties.
Finds molecules associated with specific flavors (sweet, bitter, fruity, etc.). Use when you want to know which chemical compounds create a particular flavor.
Searches molecules by FEMA flavor classifications. Use when working with industry-standard flavor classifications for food manufacturing.
Finds flavor molecules by their common chemical names. Use when you know the name of a flavor compound and want its details.

item.description: APIs for flavor molecules and their chemical properties

item.name: Entity Controller

request.description: Finds all foods or ingredients that come from a specific natural source. Use when researching what foods share the same natural origin or source.
Searches for foods or ingredients by their name and category type. Use when you need to find specific foods within a particular category (like fruits, vegetables, meats, etc.).
Searches for foods using their common, everyday names. Use when you want to look up a food using the name people actually use (like 'apple' instead of scientific names).

item.description: APIs for food items and ingredients (entities) in the database

item.name: Food Pairing Controller

request.description: Finds a food item by its name and returns similar foods that pair well with it. Use when you want to discover what foods go well together or find pairing suggestions for a specific food item.

item.description: APIs for discovering food pairings and flavor combinations
